title: Can Cyclocross and Classics Co-Exist? Mathieu van der Poel’s Most Daring Season Will Determine the Direction of Modern Multi-Disciplinarians
content:
To 'cross or not to 'cross? The success of MVDP's far-stretching 2024 season could set the tone for the multi-discipline elite.

Read the full article at Can Cyclocross and Classics Co-Exist? Mathieu van der Poel’s Most Daring Season Will Determine the Direction of Modern Multi-Disciplinarians on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
